yugiohCards.name: Dark Magician
yugiohCards.description: The ultimate wizard in terms of attack and defense.

yugiohCards.name: Blue Eyes White Dragon
yugiohCards.description: The ultimate wizard in terms of attack and defense.

yugiohCards.name: Infinite Impermanence
yugiohCards.description: Target 1 face-up monster your opponent controls; negate its effects until the end of this turn.

yugiohCards.name: Firewall Dragon
yugiohCards.description: 2+ monsters, except Tokens. Once per turn: You can target monsters on the field and/or GY up to the number of monsters co-linked to this card; return them to the hand.
